problem: 如图,等腰△ABC中,AB=AC,▱AFDE的顶点D、E、F分别在边BC、AC、AB上,如果▱AFDE的周长为30,那么等腰△ABC的腰长为()
answer: 解:∵AB=AC,∴∠B=∠C,∵DE∥AB,∴∠B=∠EDC,∴DE=EC,∵四边形AEDF是平行四边形,∴DE=AF,∴AF=CE,∴▱AEDF的周长=2(AF+AE)=2AC=30,∴AB=AC=15,故选:D．
comment: 此题考查了平行四边形的性质以及等腰三角形的判定与性质．此题难度不大,解题的关键是得到▱AEDF的周长=2(AF+AE)=2AC．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, in the isosceles △ABC, AB = AC, the vertices D, E, and F of ▱AFDE are on the sides BC, AC, and AB, respectively. If the perimeter of ▱AFDE is N_0, then the waist length of isosceles △ABC is ()
